title: Safe Coconut Water Consumption
brief: Know the difference between green and mature coconut water for safe hydration.
steps: Step 1: Identify green (unripe) coconuts - these have clear, sweet water inside.
Step 2: Drink green coconut milk freely as an excellent thirst quencher.
Step 3: Identify mature coconuts - these are brown and have thicker shells.
Step 4: If consuming mature coconut milk, drink in moderation only.
warnings: Mature coconut milk contains oil that acts as a laxative - excessive consumption will cause diarrhea.
Do not rely solely on mature coconut water for hydration due to its laxative effects.
